one - uk.ac.glos.ct5025.assignment.s1609415.item.Line.endsFree
 
oxGame - uk.ac.glos.ct5025.assignment.s1609415.game.Game.gameType
 
OXGame - Class in uk.ac.glos.ct5025.assignment.s1609415.game
This class extends Game it changes the game end condition and changes the setup to add a board it adds winLength and edgeSize parameters
OXGame(DrawUI) - Constructor for class uk.ac.glos.ct5025.assignment.s1609415.game.OXGame
 
OXGameController - Class in uk.ac.glos.ct5025.assignment.s1609415.ui
This class is the controller for oxGame.fxml it sets the handles for UI events/actions it loads the menu.fxml scene if user selects to go back
OXGameController() - Constructor for class uk.ac.glos.ct5025.assignment.s1609415.ui.OXGameController
 
OXPlayer - Class in uk.ac.glos.ct5025.assignment.s1609415.player
This class implements Player it sets the make move behaviour (move is based on lines in Board) it defines a constructor
OXPlayer(Game, Player.playerType, Player.playerName) - Constructor for class uk.ac.glos.ct5025.assignment.s1609415.player.OXPlayer
 
OXSizeController - Class in uk.ac.glos.ct5025.assignment.s1609415.ui
This class is the controller for oxSize.fxml it sets the handles for UI events/actions it is used to select the noughts and crosses game board size it loads the oxGame.fxml when the user selects done it loads the menu.fxml scene if user selects to go back
OXSizeController() - Constructor for class uk.ac.glos.ct5025.assignment.s1609415.ui.OXSizeController
 
OXSquare - Class in uk.ac.glos.ct5025.assignment.s1609415.item
This class implements Square it sets the selection behaviour it adds merging lines and defines a constructor
OXSquare(OXGame, Location, int, int) - Constructor for class uk.ac.glos.ct5025.assignment.s1609415.item.OXSquare
